objections.objection: We don't have time for implementation
objections.diffuse: That's exactly why we built our white-glove onboarding. Our team handles 90% of the setup, and most customers are fully operational in under a week. We migrate your data, configure your workflows, and train your team.

objections.objection: We've tried similar tools before and they failed
objections.diffuse: I appreciate your caution. Can I ask what went wrong? Most failed implementations come from poor fit or weak support. We actually offer a pilot program where you can test with a small team first, and our 98% retention rate shows we're different.

Let's calculate your current cost of not solving this. Between the hours wasted on manual work, the tools you're paying for, and the opportunities missed - most teams find they're spending more on their current pain than our solution would cost.

objections.objection: Our team won't adopt new software
objections.diffuse: Change management is real - that's why we include adoption training at no extra cost. Plus, our interface was designed with input from teams who hate software. If someone can use email, they can use this.

objections.objection: We need it to integrate with [specific tool]
objections.diffuse: We have native integrations with 200+ tools and an open API for anything else. In fact, our integration team can build custom connections as part of your onboarding if needed. Let me check on that specific integration right now.

objections.objection: We're locked into a contract with our current vendor
objections.diffuse: We see this a lot. Many customers run us in parallel during that period, then fully transition. We even offer contract buyout credits for qualified accounts. When does your current contract end?

Security is our top priority. We're SOC 2 Type II certified, GDPR compliant, and undergo annual third-party penetration testing. Your data is encrypted at rest and in transit, and we never sell or share it. Would you like to see our security documentation?

objections.objection: We need to involve more stakeholders
objections.diffuse: Absolutely - this is an important decision. I'd be happy to schedule a demo for your full team, or I can send you materials to share internally. Who else needs to be part of this decision?
